      void export(java.io.File selectedFile, ProjectDTO dto)
      compress and export a selected project No specific encryption is done, since the files are already encrypted

      Finds an object in the database by its id.

      Retrieve a project from the database
      ProjectDTO load(java.io.File selectedArchive, ProjectDTO projectDTO, UserDTO userDTO)
      Load a project previously exported in a tar.gz It will ask the user the project password, decrypt the project to store the hash in the database
      Canvas loadSavedCanvas(ProjectDTO dto, java.lang.String password)
      Load a canvas previously saved into a .bin file If the .bin.enc file has been deleted or never saved, a new Canvas is created This method will also decrypt the file .bin.enc to readable .bin
      ProjectDTO save(Canvas canvas, ProjectDTO dto)
      Save the canvas into a .bin file Hash the file and update the database Encrypt the .bin file if required in which case it deletes the non encrypted file
      void update(ProjectDTO dto)
      Updates an entry in the database.

                       ProjectDTO dto)

        Save the canvas into a .bin file Hash the file and update the database Encrypt the .bin file if required in which case it deletes the non encrypted file

      • loadSavedCanvas

        public Canvas loadSavedCanvas(ProjectDTO dto,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws FatalException
        Load a canvas previously saved into a .bin file If the .bin.enc file has been deleted or never saved, a new Canvas is created This method will also decrypt the file .bin.enc to readable .bin
        Specified by:
        loadSavedCanvas in interface ProjectDAO
        Parameters:
        dto - of project concerned
        password - the password of the file
        Returns:
        the Canvas
        Throws:
        FatalException - in case of I/O exception

      • load

        public ProjectDTO load(java.io.File selectedArchive,
                       ProjectDTO projectDTO,
                       UserDTO userDTO)
                throws FatalException,
                       BizzException
        Load a project previously exported in a tar.gz It will ask the user the project password, decrypt the project to store the hash in the database
        Specified by:
        load in interface ProjectDAO
        Parameters:
        selectedArchive - The archive to import
        projectDTO - DTO with the name of the new project once imported
        userDTO - Active user
        Returns:
        the projectDTO of the newly loaded project
        Throws:
        FatalException - in case of I/O Exception or if a project of that name already exists
        BizzException - in case of invalid or empty tar.gz
